pageContext.claim: “Together, we're restoring this nation's industrial might and we are doing it with American iron, American aluminum and American steel. We're doing steel. Steel industry is hot. They were dumping steel all over. They were destroying our companies. U.S. Steel now, all of them. They're all expanding. The steel industry is back. It's doing great.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump often claims his steel tariffs have reinvigorated the industry. But in reality, steel prices and demand have fallen this year, and U.S. Steel announced it was idling two blast furnaces weeks before Trump made this claim.
